ThingDef.label: 6.8 spear short rifle
ThingDef.description: A short barreled spear rifle originating from some ancient military supplier. Has a fast firing rate, but a compromising range.

ThingDef.label: 6.8 spear rifle
ThingDef.description: A 6.8 caliber standard rifle originating from some ancient military supplier. Equipped with a variable magnification sight.

ThingDef.label: Heavy Barrel Assault Rifle
ThingDef.description: A modified heavy barrel MCXspear originating from some ancient military supplier. It's been modified to be .300 caliber, suitable for medium range combat.

ThingDef.label: 6.8 bullpup short rifle
ThingDef.description: A TKB022 rifle originating from some ancient military supplier. It's been modded with a modified caliber of 6.8. Its accuracy is somewhat questionable as it is not designed for this caliber.

ThingDef.label: 6.8 short rifle
ThingDef.description: An AK rifle originating from some ancient military supplier. With a caliber of 6.8, its been modified to have high power and fast firing rate. Due to the short barrel, the range is not optimal.

ThingDef.label: 6.8 combat rifle
ThingDef.description: A 6.8 caliber SCAR originating from some ancient military supplier. Poses a terrifying threat at medium range.

ThingDef.label: 6.8 bullpup rifle
ThingDef.description: A buttless experimental 6.8 caliber weapon originating from some ancient military supplier. It has a sluggish firing rate and a longer barrel that enhances its long-range accuracy.

ThingDef.label: rattler assault rifle
ThingDef.description: A close combat specialized .300BLK assault rifle originating from some ancient military supplier. This modified version uses a longer barrel and stock, enhancing mid range accuracy.

ThingDef.label: rattler short rifle
ThingDef.description: A specialized .300BLK assault rifle for close combat originating from some ancient military supplier. This modified version uses a short barrel and large drum for higher intensity at close range.

ThingDef.label: civilian rifle
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic high-precision civilian AR rifle originating from some ancient military supplier. It uses special air pointed bullets and has a strong stopping effect.

ThingDef.label: custom carbine
ThingDef.description: Customized M4A1 carbine originating from some ancient military supplier. Very light.

ThingDef.label: custom military rifle
ThingDef.description: A new model M4A1 of military regulations originating from some ancient military supplier. It is equipped with a silencer.

ThingDef.label: short assault rifle
ThingDef.description: A self modified large drum close combat M4 originating from some ancient military supplier. It has strong firepower at close range，with a thermal imaging sight and flashlight. Great for close range indoor combat.

ThingDef.label: low visibility short rifle
ThingDef.description: The ultimate form of the short barrel M4, originating from some ancient military supplier. It is equipped with a strong flashlight and large drum, along with an adjustable magnification scope to ensure range.

ThingDef.label: military standard rifle
ThingDef.description: A 5.56-caliber AK assault rifle originating from some ancient military supplier with very low recoil.

ThingDef.label: wave rifle
ThingDef.description: A silencing assault rifle used in special operations originating from some ancient military supplier. It is quite lethal but has limited range.

ThingDef.label: vintorez special rifle
ThingDef.description: A silencing sniper rifle used in special operations originating from some ancient military supplier. Can shoot automatically, which is very lethal but has limited range and a small magazine.

ThingDef.label: urban assault rifle
ThingDef.description: A .308 caliber buttless rifle MDR originating from some ancient military supplier. It has high accuracy and controllable recoil, allowing for fully automatic shooting.

ThingDef.label: combat rifle
ThingDef.description: A 762 NATO caliber assault rifle originating from some ancient military supplier. It is long and not very flexible, equipped with a silencer.

ThingDef.label: DMR
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic DMR produced by an ancient company named Remington. It has high shooting accuracy.

ThingDef.label: close combat DMR
ThingDef.description: A 7.62 NATO caliber DMR originating from some ancient military supplier. It was modified using a close range kit.

ThingDef.label: Hunter's rifle
ThingDef.description: A Civil .308 single shot hunting rifle originating from some ancient military supplier. It is powerful but has very little ammunition capacity.

ThingDef.label: custom sniper rifle
ThingDef.description: A specially customized M700 bolt action sniper rifle originating from some ancient military supplier. Has good accuracy and is light weight.

ThingDef.label: Mjölnir sniper rifle
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic DMR with a caliber of .338LM originating from some ancient military supplier. With its terrifying power and massive gunfire, in ancient times it earned the nickname Mjölnir.

ThingDef.label: general machine gun
ThingDef.description: The lightest general-purpose machine gun originating from some ancient military supplier. Paired with large caliber armor piercing shells and variable magnification sights, it gives an advantage at any distance.

ThingDef.label: modified machine gun
ThingDef.description: The lightest general-purpose machine gun originating from some ancient military supplier. Paired with large caliber armor piercing shells and close combat sights, it makes a terrifying close range weapon.

ThingDef.label: old auto rifle
ThingDef.description: A fully automatic rifle originating from some ancient military supplier. Has poor accuracy but extremely powerful damage.

ThingDef.label: copperhead SMG
ThingDef.description: A medium to close range submachine gun originating from some ancient military supplier. It is equipped with a silencer, which is very flexible and uses Armor piercing pistol cartridges.

ThingDef.label: copperhead long SMG
ThingDef.description: A weapon originating from some ancient military supplier. Extending the barrel of the MPX gives it a combat range similar to that of a rifle, but sacrifices some flexibility.

ThingDef.label: civilian carbine
ThingDef.description: A civilian semi-automatic carbine originating from some ancient military supplier. It uses a heavy pistol bullet, which is very precise but it doesn't deal a lot of damage.

ThingDef.label: custom civilian carbine
ThingDef.description: A civilian semi-automatic carbine gun originating from some ancient military supplier. It uses a heavy handgun cartridge with a modified silencing brake and magnifying glass, which increases the range compared to the original version.

ThingDef.label: Stechkin pistol
ThingDef.description: A fully automatic submachine gun originating from some ancient military supplier. Very light.

ThingDef.label: Makarov pistol
ThingDef.description: A small semi-automatic pistol originating from some ancient military supplier.

ThingDef.label: armor piercing pistol
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic pistol using special ammunition. Originating from some ancient military supplier.

ThingDef.label: defense pistol
ThingDef.description: A special pistol originating from some ancient military supplier. It uses armor piercing bullets, with a large capacity and high firing rate.
